column5: The video speaks for it's self.
Now we all know Mattel has more quality products than the dollarama, but this should inspire some good fishing!!!
It's not the toys.  It's the angler.   neat vid.
Big deal, let's see him do that in a kayak!
HOLY DAAAAAANG!! That was pretty awesome!! hahaha... so true tho... not the rod, its the angler!
Thats pretty neat stuff....  I see a barbie fishing tourney coming...
maybe that's what I'd doing wrong... I should pick up the transformers kids rod I saw the other  day!!!
